<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;std::pair&lt;BasicBlockT &#42;, BasicBlockT &#42;&gt;</a>, 8&gt; Seen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;UpdateT, 8&gt;</a> DeduplicatedUpdates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;U : Updates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge = std::make&#95;pair(U.getFrom(), U.getTo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because it is illegal to submit updates that have already been applied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and updates to an edge need to be strictly ordered,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is safe to infer the existence of an edge from the first update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to this edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the first update to an edge is &quot;Delete&quot;, it means that the edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// existed before. If the first update to an edge is &quot;Insert&quot;, it means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the edge didn&#39;t exist before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, if the user submits &#123;&#123;Delete, A, B&#125;, &#123;Insert, A, B&#125;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 it is illegal to submit updates that have already been applied,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e., user cannot delete an nonexistent edge,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 updates to an edge need to be strictly ordered,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So, initially edge A -&gt; B existed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can then safely ignore future updates to this edge and directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inspect the current CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a. If the edge still exists, because the user cannot insert an existent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edge, so both &#123;Delete, A, B&#125;, &#123;Insert, A, B&#125; actually happened and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resulted in a no-op. DTU won&#39;t submit any update in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b. If the edge doesn&#39;t exist, we can then infer that &#123;Delete, A, B&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually happened but &#123;Insert, A, B&#125; was an invalid update which never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// happened. DTU will submit &#123;Delete, A, B&#125; in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a5c325f9e45c085ee9757538409359e21">isSelfDominance</a>(U) &amp;&amp; Seen.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Edge).second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the update doesn&#39;t appear in the CFG, it means that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either the change isn&#39;t made or relevant operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result in a no-op.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ac69f0f33bd155d164f8f39c96647c413">isUpdateValid</a>(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#afce0c05f1246398130114d3744926871">isLazy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ad09768c934fd481e5a641cc327d1a5cb">PendUpdates</a>.push&#95;back(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DeduplicatedUpdates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a6c1229274a768152e5ed6af3872af602">Strategy</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a2655b89361decf2c1493792dc14e5a56a46a9ebdb80117bfa1f0cdea65438290a">UpdateStrategy::Lazy</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bail out early if there is nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT || Edges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#ac835b8735b1b2faec0efdca236e37d94">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember all the basic blocks that are inserted during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edge splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invariant: NewBBs == all the basic blocks contained in the NewBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// field of all the elements of Edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// I.e., forall elt in Edges, it exists BB in NewBBs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such as BB == elt.NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlockT &#42;, 32&gt;</a> NewBBs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Edge.NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each element in Edges, remember whether or not element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the new immediate domminator of its successor. The mapping is done by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index, i.e., the information for the ith element of Edges is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the ith element of IsNewIDom.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallbitvector">SmallBitVector</a> IsNewIDom(Edges.size(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect all the dominance properties info, before invalidating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the underlying DT.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Edge&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Edges)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update dominator information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BasicBlockT &#42;Succ = Edge.ToBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SuccDTNode = DT-&gt;getNode(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BasicBlockT &#42;PredBB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(Succ)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredBB == Edge.NewBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are in this situation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FromBB1        FromBB2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    +              +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   + +            + +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  +   +          +   +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...  Split1  Split2 ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           +   +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            + +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            Succ</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instead of checking the domiance property with Split2, we check it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with FromBB2 since Split2 is still unknown of the underlying DT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#ae04ad615dfdd885e85cbddda146787c6">contains</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f211484edf604716a6c80030b0a0375">pred&#95;size</a>(PredBB) == 1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;A basic block resulting from a &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;critical edge split has more &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;than one predecessor!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PredBB = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3e549d97549636a7f08779d5cd98540">pred&#95;begin</a>(PredBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT-&gt;dominates(SuccDTNode, DT-&gt;getNode(PredBB))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IsNewIDom&#91;Idx&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, update DT with the collected dominance properties info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Edge&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Edges)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know FromBB dominates NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewDTNode = DT-&gt;addNewBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all the other predecessors of &quot;Succ&quot; are dominated by &quot;Succ&quot; itself</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the new block is the new immediate dominator of &quot;Succ&quot;. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the new block doesn&#39;t dominate anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsNewIDom&#91;Idx&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DT-&gt;changeImmediateDominator(DT-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB), NewDTNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Post dominator tree is different, the new basic block in critical edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may become the new root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DerivedT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DomTreeT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PostDomTreeT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater">GenericDomTreeUpdater&lt;DerivedT, DomTreeT, PostDomTreeT&gt;::</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater">splitPDTCriticalEdges</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CriticalEdge&gt;</a> Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bail out early if there is nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PDT || Edges.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;UpdateT&gt; Updates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Insert, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Insert, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Updates.push&#95;back(&#123;PostDomTreeT::Delete, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>.ToBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
